name: ThatDeadGuy - for Android
description:
An endless runner game in retro-wave / outrun setting where you control a cyber skeleton who runs an endless parkour to collect cassettes and upgrade itself.

Features the amazing soundtracks made by Yunus Emre Koçak a.k.a. bel4ride.

Supported Platform: Android™
Android is a trademark of Google LLC.

Both arm65 and armv7 are supported. You can choose to directly download it from Google Play Store link down below which will pick and download the right one automatically for your device.
